brand.name: The Blog Timer
hub.minutes.title: Minute Timers
hub.minutes.desc: Browse all minute-based countdown timers from 1 to 100 minutes.
hub.minutes.meta: Free online minute timers from 1 to 100 minutes. Accurate countdown with sound alerts, works on any device.
hub.minutes.intro: Choose from our full collection of minute-based countdown timers. Each timer includes audio alerts, custom naming, and works across all your devices.
hub.seconds.title: Second Timers
hub.seconds.desc: Browse all second-based countdown timers for quick intervals and rapid timing.
hub.seconds.meta: Free online second timers for quick countdowns. Precise timing with audio alerts for exercise, intervals, and more.
hub.seconds.intro: Quick second-based countdown timers for intervals, exercises, and rapid timing needs. Every timer includes sound alerts and device-wide compatibility.
hub.pomodoro.title: Pomodoro Timer
hub.pomodoro.desc: Use the Pomodoro technique with preset work and break cycles.
hub.pomodoro.meta: Free online Pomodoro timer with 25/5 and 50/10 presets. Track sessions, get alerts, and boost your productivity.
hub.pomodoro.intro: The Pomodoro Technique helps you work in focused intervals separated by short breaks. Choose a preset cycle or customize your own to match your workflow.
hub.usecases.title: Timer Use Cases
hub.usecases.desc: Discover how timers can help with productivity, cooking, exercise, meditation, and studying.
hub.usecases.meta: Find the perfect timer for your activity. Curated timer recommendations for productivity, cooking, exercise, meditation, and studying.
hub.usecases.intro: Timers aren't one-size-fits-all. Explore curated timer recommendations for your specific activity and find the perfect duration for your needs.
timer.meta.minutes_a: Start a {value}-minute countdown timer with sound alerts. Free, accurate, and works on any device.
timer.meta.minutes_b: Use this {value}-minute timer for focus, breaks, cooking, or workouts. Simple controls and clear alerts.
timer.meta.minutes_c: Set a {value}-minute timer instantly. Custom name, presets, and reliable countdown on desktop or mobile.
timer.meta.seconds_a: Start a {value}-second countdown timer with sound alerts. Free, accurate, and works on any device.
timer.meta.seconds_b: Use this {value}-second timer for exercise intervals, breathing, or quick tasks. Simple and precise.
timer.meta.seconds_c: Set a {value}-second timer instantly. Fast, reliable countdown for any quick timing need.
timer.seo_title.minutes: Set Timer for {value} Minutes – The Blog Timer
timer.seo_title.seconds: Set Timer for {value} Seconds – The Blog Timer
home.subtext: Set precise timers for work, cooking, exercise, and more.
howto.step1.title: Choose Your Duration
howto.step1.desc: Select a preset timer or enter a custom duration from 1 to 100 minutes or seconds.
howto.step2.title: Press Start
howto.step2.desc: Hit the Start button and your countdown begins immediately. Pause or reset anytime.
howto.step3.title: Get Notified
howto.step3.desc: When time's up, you'll hear a clear audio alert. Replay the sound or start a new timer.
features.precision.title: Precision Timing
features.precision.desc: Accurate to the second using timestamp-based counting that even handles background tabs.
features.audio.title: Audio Alerts
features.audio.desc: Clear, pleasant sound notification when your timer completes. Never miss an alert.
features.custom.title: Fully Customizable
features.custom.desc: Name your timer, choose any duration, switch between minutes and seconds freely.
features.multilang.title: Works Everywhere
features.multilang.desc: Runs on any device with a browser. No downloads, no installs, no sign-up required.
